## ValueRef.addListener() method

Add a listener. This will return a remover.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(fn: (newVal: T, oldVal: T) => void): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | (newVal: T, oldVal: T) =&gt; void |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

() =&gt; void

## Example


```ts
React.useEffect(() => ref.addListener(setState))
```
